title: nx-rs standalone migration continuation
description: Continuation epic in standalone repo ~/code/nx-rs after extraction from ~/.nix-config/scripts/nx-rs. Historical parent epic in old tracker: morgan-pnv.

title: Expand rust parity subset to where_found and remove_dry_run
description: Extend current rust parity-enabled cases to include where_found and remove_dry_run with semantic output/file-diff parity.
acceptance_criteria: just parity-check-rust passes with new cases enabled.

title: Implement info/status command parity skeleton
description: Add deterministic implementations for info and status with correct exit codes and baseline-compatible output semantics.
acceptance_criteria: Relevant parity cases can be added and pass against python baselines.

title: Plan decommission of ~/.nix-config/scripts/nx-rs copy
description: Define safe decommission steps for old in-tree location and integration hooks after standalone repo is canonical.
acceptance_criteria: Documented cutover task exists with explicit rollback and verification checks.
